rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious hall with foyer integrated with an irregular entrance layout.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Centrally located open space with Bohemian decor and natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with ample seating arrangement.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with functional layout and storage in line with Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with balcony access on one side. Decorated in Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Balcony (Guest)
rooms.description: Spacious balcony attached to Guest Bedroom 1 for relaxation and views.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an attached balcony offering serene views.

rooms.name: Balcony (Master)
rooms.description: Spacious balcony providing private outdoor space and good Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with Bohemian decor and a small balcony for fresh air.

rooms.name: Balcony (Bedroom)
rooms.description: Attached balcony offering scenic views, placed according to Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Intimate library space designed for reading and quiet reflection, following the split-level layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Well-planned bedroom for joint family members with a private balcony.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Fully equipped home theater with acoustic panels and ambient lighting for immersive experiences.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for storage of audio-visual equipment and maintenance tools.
